displayName.text: Law Office of Miouly E. Pongnon

formattedAddress: 2005 5th Ave 1st floor, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2005 5th Ave 1st floor, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text:
Miouly did a phenomenal job to get me visitation rights to my children in family court. She is Brilliant, compassionate and honest. In addition, her fee was responsible because she based it on my limited income.
Miouly represented me in a criminal Case. After three hearings, for which she charged a low fee, she was not only able to get the case dismissed, but she also got the record sealed. I could not dream of a better lawyer. I recommend her to all my family and friends.

text.text:
Miouly did a phenomenal job to get me visitation rights to my children in family court. She is Brilliant, compassionate and honest. In addition, her fee was responsible because she based it on my limited income.
Miouly represented me in a criminal Case. After three hearings, for which she charged a low fee, she was not only able to get the case dismissed, but she also got the record sealed. I could not dream of a better lawyer. I recommend her to all my family and friends.

originalText.text: I hired Miouly Pongnon to represent me in the closing on a HDFC Co-op apartment purchase.  She provided clear guidance at every step of the process, including explaining the meaning of all legal documents in the loan process.  She was very patient and thorough.  Even when the first loan failed, she did not charge me more to review the second bank's loan documents.  While Miouly's legal fees were very affordable, I feel that I received the best representation money could buy.

Even when the first loan failed, she did not charge me more to review the second bank's loan documents.  While Miouly's legal fees were very affordable, I feel that I received the best representation money could buy.

originalText.text: Miouly represented me in traffic court after my driver’s license had been wrongfully suspended.  For a really reasonable fee, Miouly appeared at hearing for me and was able to have my license restored.  I use her for all legal matters that come up in my personal and business matters.  She is very professional and effective!

text.text: Miouly represented me in traffic court after my driver’s license had been wrongfully suspended. She is very professional and effective!

originalText.text: I have relied on Ms. Pongnon’s counseling (“brief service”) several times in connection with a custody battle for my children in Family Court.  She was always very patient and understanding.  She provided very useful and effective legal guidance on how I could use the facts in my case to help me maintain custody and to stop my ex from harassing me.  She gave me peace of mind when I needed it most.

originalText.text: As a client of this law firm, I can attest that the counsel provided was simply the best. Very effective and determined attorney.
